Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface IEnquiryResponderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryResponderService
public interface IEnquiryResponderService
The IEnquiryResponderService interface defines methods for pertaining to the response to camp-related enquiries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<Integer,Enquiry>
    getAllEnquiriesForCamp(Camp camp)
    Retrieves all enquiries for the specified camp.
    Map<Integer,Enquiry>
    getAllPendingEnquiriesForCamp(Camp camp)
    Retrieves all pending enquiries for the specified camp.
    boolean
    respondToEnquiry(int enquiryID, String responderID, MessageStatus status, String response)
    Responds to the specified enquiry with the provided details.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPendingEnquiriesForCamp

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getAllPendingEnquiriesForCamp(Camp camp)
      Retrieves all pending enquiries for the specified camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp for which to retrieve pending enquiries
      Returns:
      a Map of pending enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object

    • getAllEnquiriesForCamp

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getAllEnquiriesForCamp(Camp camp)
      Retrieves all enquiries for the specified camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp for which to retrieve enquiries
      Returns:
      a Map of all enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object

    • respondToEnquiry

      boolean respondToEnquiry(int enquiryID, String responderID, MessageStatus status, String response)
      Responds to the specified enquiry with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - the ID of the enquiry to respond to
      responderID - the ID of the responder (e.g., student or committee member)
      status - the MessageStatus indicating the response status
      response - the response message
      Returns:
      true if the response is successful, false otherwise
